title: The Evolution of a Girl
description: The Evolution of a Girl is a collection of poetry and prose taking the reader from girl to woman; from heartbreak and anger to transformation and rebirth. It speaks of the strength we find when learning to accept ourselves, and the unbreakable softness that comes from unyielding self-love.A book for those who are hurting, for those who are healing, for those who are ready to try again.
author: L.E. Bowman
